page.title: 17Mobile Library.
page.content: Leven has a Mobile Library van which goes around the suburbs of the town and also the landward area. The van is driven by a man called Jim and a Library Assistant serves the customers. It leaves in the morning at 9.00 a.m. and goes to small villages which dont have a library. People from farms and isolated cottages come to the stopping places,such as Smithy- green. Although they travel throughout the year, sometimes on bad roads,they have never had an accident . * * They have a variety of books,the most popular being Romances,Thrillers, Westerns and Biographies. They also stock childrens books and large print books for people whose eyesight is not so good. { * *
